summary: Adds a trapdoor to a dynamic treasure vault, which fills with more and more treasure and gold the more money you add. The vault also have 6 weapon plaques and 2 weapon cases to display your finest weapons!
descriptionHtml:
Hjerim Dynamic Vault
Add a hidden treasure vault to Hjerim and watch it grow with gold and treasure the more gold you put in a conveniently placed strongbox! The vault also have 2 chests, 12 mannequins, 6 weapon plaques and 2 weapon cases  for safe storage and to display your finest weapons and armor.

This connects a underground treasure vault to Hjerim, accessible via a trapdoor. When the house is furnished the trapdoor is hidden beneath some sacks beside the entrance.
The door in the vault is a big dwemer door which might seem strange as you enter through a trapdoor, but I justify that by imagining you\'re traveling through a few hallways before arriving.

Update 1.6
Added a new room with 12 mannequins leading up to the treasure vault. Also moved the chests to the new room.
Update 1.5
Changed the trapdoor to a darker variant which blends in better with the floor. Changed the lighting in the vault. Added 2 safe storage chests.
Update 1.3
Added 6 weapon plaques, 2 weapon cases, dimmed the light in the vault a bit and moved some candles.

Millwater Retreat Dynamic Treasure Vault http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36967//?
Adds this vault to the mod Millwater Retreat.

This is a modification of the great mod Als Treasure Vault by AlCiao 
( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9994//? ).
author: mikom31
